Sasuke slashes the opponent into the air with his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|sword]] and jumps after them. He then proceeds to kick, backfist and slash them while still in midair as he tumbles around, ending in a heel drop akin to the original Lion Combo. However, Sasuke quickly lands on the floor, holds up a formed-Chidori on his left hand to have the falling victim land on it.

== Trivia ==

* Akin to the ''Storm'' series' version of Part 1 Sasuke's Lion Combo done solely as a midair string, this version of the Lion Combo also does not make use of the [[Shadow of the Dancing Leaf]] technique.
